solution.text:
Height of barrel, h \(=_{j}_\)m
Diameter of barrel, d \(=_{k}_\)m
\(\Rightarrow\) Radius, r \(=_{{Fraction(k,2)}}_=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)m
Total surface area of barrel \(=2\pi r(h+r)\)
\(=2\pi \times _{{k/Decimal(2)}}_ \times (_{j}_+_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_)\)
\(=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(k/Decimal(2)))),3)}}_m^2\)

content.text: The total surface area of a barrel of height \(_{j}_\)m and diameter \(_{k}_\)m used to store oil.
